internationalInstructions: Form fields must be filled out using only Latin characters.

banner.title: Apply for a Library Card Online

home.title: Apply for a library card today in a few easy steps

description.part1: Do you live, work, go to school, or pay property taxes in New York State? Get a free library card now to access everything The New York Public Library has to offer!
description.part2: Start your application now and begin using e-books and other {{digitalResources}} right away. Then, {{visitNYPL}} to verify your information and receive a physical NYPL card. This card gives you access to even more from the Library, including physical books and the Culture Pass program.
description.part3: If you are visiting New York from another state, you can apply for a temporary card with this form. Before your visit, you can request physical materials and schedule research appointments. For additional Library services, you must validate your card in person at an NYPL location within 30 days.
description.part4: If you are visiting from another country, please use our {{alternateForm}} for international visitors. With your temporary card, you may request materials and schedule research appointments.
description.part5: Learn more about {{whatYouCanAccess}} with your library card!
description.part6: By submitting an application, you understand and agree to our {{termsConditions}} and agree to our {{rulesRegulations}}. To learn more about the Library's use of personal information, please read our {{privacyPolicy}}.

banner.text: Please note: You must be at least 13 years old to apply online. To get a digital library card and immediate access to online resources, you must be in New York state when submitting an application.

personal.title: Step 1 of 5: Personal information
personal.ageGate: Yes, I am over 13 years old.

email.label: Email address
email.instruction: An email address is required to use many of our digital resources, such as e-books. If you do not wish to provide an email address, you can apply for a physical card using our {{alternateForm}}. Once filled out, please visit one of our {{locations}} with proof of identity and home address to pick up your card.

eCommunications.labelText: Yes, I would like to receive information about NYPL's programs and services

errorMessage.firstName: There was a problem. Please enter a valid first name.
errorMessage.lastName: There was a problem. Please enter a valid last name.
errorMessage.birthdate: There was a problem. Please enter a valid date, MM/DD/YYYY, including slashes.
errorMessage.ageGate: There was a problem. You must be 13 years or older to continue.
errorMessage.email: There was a problem. Please enter a valid email address.

address.title: Home address
address.description: If you live in NYC, please fill out the home address form.

description.part1: The application process is slightly different depending on whether you live, work, go to school, or pay property taxes in New York City, elsewhere in New York State, or elsewhere in the United States and you're just visiting New York City. Please select one of the following and fill out the required fields.
description.part2: If you work or go to school in NYC please provide the address.

errorMessage.line1: There was a problem. Please enter a valid street address.
errorMessage.city: There was a problem. Please enter a valid city.
errorMessage.state: There was a problem. Please enter a 2-character state abbreviation.
errorMessage.zip: There was a problem. Please enter a 5 or 9-digit postal code.

account.title: Step 4 of 5: Customize your account
account.description: Create a username and password so you can log in and manage your account or access an array of our digital resources. Your username should be unique.

password.label: Password
password.instruction:
We encourage you to select a strong password that includes: at least 8 characters, a mixture of uppercase and lowercase letters, a mixture of letters and numbers, and at least one special character except period (.)
Example: MyLib1731@
Password cannot contain common patterns such as consecutively repeating a character three or more times, e.g. aaaatf54 or repeating a pattern, e.g. abcabcab

library.placeholder: Type a library name, such as Parkchester Library
library.title: Home library

description.part1: Choosing a home library will help us make sure you're getting everything you need from a branch that's most convenient for you.
description.part2: You can skip this step and update it at any point through your account.

termsAndCondition.label: Yes, I accept the terms and conditions.
termsAndCondition.text: By submitting an application, you understand and agree to our Cardholder Terms and Conditions and agree to our Rules and Regulations. To learn more about the Library’s use of personal information, please read our Privacy Policy.

errorMessage.username: There was a problem. Username must be between 5-25 alphanumeric characters.
errorMessage.password: There was a problem. Your password must be at least 8 characters, include a mixture of both uppercase and lowercase letters, include a mixture of letters and numbers, and have at least one special character except period (.)
errorMessage.verifyPassword: There was a problem. The two passwords don't match.
errorMessage.acceptTerms: There was a problem. The Terms and Conditions must be checked.

review.title: Step 5 of 5: Confirm your information
review.description: Make sure all the information you’ve entered is correct. If needed, you can still make changes before you submit your application.
review.receiveNewsletter: Receive information about NYPL's programs and services
review.nextStep: After you submit your application, you will see a confirmation page with your account information, and you will be able to log in and request books and materials.

confirmation.title: Congratulations! You now have a digital New York Public Library card.

description.part1: Print or save this information for your records. Within 24 hours, you will receive an email with the details of your account.
description.part2: To borrow physical materials, please visit one of our locations with a valid photo ID and proof of address to complete the application for a physical card.
description.part3: This is a temporary card and will expire in 30 days. If you are a student in a New York–accredited college, an employee at a NYC company but not physically in the city or state, or a researcher who will be visiting one of our research centers, contact gethelp@nypl.org to update your card.

globalErrors.title: Form submission error
globalErrors.defaultError: There was an error processing your submission. Please try again later.

apiErrors.defaultError: There were errors with your submission.
